name: Sylvetica
comment:
>>38204414

> [[ Ascheritte ]]: We're about to head out. The gate sounds fine.
> [[ Smith ]]: Excellent. I'll meet you there.
> [[ Ascheritte ]]: By the by, you should try offering some of the Identifiers to the Celestial Altar.
> [[ Ascheritte ]]: I'm not sure if it helps, but it gave me a good feeling. Seems like as good a start as any.
> [[ Smith ]]: Yes, I've heard the rumors.

“What's up, Ashe?” Aelriss looks up from her own UI menu, then goes back to finishing a message of her own.

“Talking to my friend.” You respond. “The guy who's warehouse we were in. I'm gonna return his money.”

“The guy with the flying homicidal blender?” She glares. “Yeah, that's on you.”

There's an intrusive ping.

> [[ UI Messenger – Ayla ]]
> [[ Ayla ]]: (( Alright, I've had enough of this. I'm on my way back to my hall if you still need me. ))

> “One sec. Gotta run an errand.”
> “Change in plans. Going to go farm. Want to come with?”
> Write-in
